Name: emotion_trajectory_cbta
Title: Emotion Trajectory Analysis for Adaptive CBT Agents
Experiment: Extend emotion detection by modeling user emotional trajectories over time. Adapt CBT strategies dynamically using historical patterns and session-level feedback to improve mental well-being outcomes.

Name: concept_driven_academic_agent
Title: Concept-Driven Academic Agent Using Adaptive RAG and Curriculum Mapping
Experiment: Design a personalized academic agent that uses curriculum-aware document retrieval and concept tracing to align learning resources with student progress. Evaluate retention, engagement, and concept mastery.

Name: career_trajectory_predictor
Title: Future-Back Reasoning for Career Planning via AI Concept Simulation
Experiment: Use multi-modal user profiling and market trend data to simulate potential future career paths. The model iteratively refines goals and suggests actionable steps using concept evolution techniques.

Name: phased_companion_controller
Title: Phase-Adaptive Orchestration for Modular AI Companions
Experiment: Implement a control layer that dynamically orchestrates specialized LCMs based on user life stage and context. Evaluate adaptability and user experience over time using simulated life transitions.
